name: Beckoning Armor
description: Wrap yourself in hardened bone, granting you Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5948 for 20 seconds.    While active, enemies that strike you with ranged attacks will be pulled toward you once every 3 seconds.  Creates a corpse when the effect completes.
effectLines: Pulls in ranged enemies.  Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.
rawDescription:
Wrap yourself in hardened bone, granting you Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by <<1>> for <<2>>. 

While active, enemies that strike you with ranged attacks will be pulled toward you once every <<3>>.

Creates a corpse when the effect completes.
